nodes.text: Paqualis III, also known as Paqualis, was a terrestrial astronomical object in the Inner Rim, situated along the Hydian Way and positioned at the coordinates L-8 on the Standard Galactic Grid. Following a skirmish with the bounty hunters 4-LOM and Zuckuss, the smuggler Han Solo offered to pilot the pair to an outpost on Paqualis III, near the Bounty Hunters' Guild.

In the new Star Wars canon, Paqualis III was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, released in 2016. In Star Wars Legends, Paqualis III was a planet originally created for the 1994 book Galaxy Guide 10: Bounty Hunters, by Rick D. Stuart.
